summary: An email from an FBI Special Agent inquiring about courtroom sketches from the Ghislaine Maxwell trial in December, seeking to view a sketch possibly depicting them and asking about the cost of obtaining a copy.

persons.name: Special Agen
persons.context: Author of the email, inquiring about courtroom sketches from the Maxwell trial, and is associated with the FBI New York Field Office Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Desk.

events.title: Maxwell Trial
events.description: The trial of Ghislaine Maxwell, which took place in December, where courtroom sketches were created.

keyFacts: An FBI Special Agent from the New York Field Office's Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Desk inquired about courtroom sketches from the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.
The email suggests the agent may have been depicted in a courtroom sketch during the Maxwell trial in December.
The correspondence is dated February 11, 2022, indicating post-trial follow-up regarding trial artifacts.
